description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1leln","text":"This protocol describes the immunoblotting for components of the LRRK2 signalling pathway (LRRK2, LRRK2 pS935 and phospho-Rabs) using Invitrogen NuPage SDS-PAGE reagents and the BioRad Turbo Blot transfer system. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research (MJFF) and the Aligning Science Across Parkinson’s (ASAP) Initiative

keywords: Western Blot, LRRK2, Rab GTPase, phosporylation, NuPAGE, Turbo Blot
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6nb15","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vi06","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3p4ib","text":"Lysis buffer: 20 mM Tris-HCl (pH 7.5), 150 mM NaCl, 1 mM Na2EDTA, 1 mM EGTA, 1% (v/v) Triton X-100","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":59,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8itjr","text":"NOTE: add protease and phosphatase inhibitors fresh each time (eg Halt™ Protease and Phosphatase Inhibitor Cocktail (100X), #78440, ThermoFisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ubva","text":"Loading buffer: NuPAGE LDS sample buffer (#NP0007, ThermoFisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d445i","text":"Sample reducing agent: NuPAGE sample reducing agent (#NP0009, ThermoFisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnovl","text":"4-12% Bis-Tris NuPAGE gels (eg #NP0321BOX, ThermoFisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v0m7","text":"SDS-PAGE running buffer: MES running buffer (#NP0002, ThermoFisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l67p","text":"Trans-Blot® Turbo™ PVDF Transfer Packs: eg #1704157, BioRad","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i25u","text":"TBS-T: 50 mM Tris–HCl, pH 7.5, 150 mM NaCl, 0.05% (v/v) Tween 20. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk6tb","text":"Blocking and antibody dilution buffer: 5 % (w/v) non-fat milk powder in TBS-T","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5enpe","text":"Primary and secondary antibodies (see table 1 for primary antibody suggestions)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g83q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fetcr","text":"Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71gp4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bctk","text":"Gel tank (#A25977, ThermoFisher Scientific; or similar)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s5ml","text":"Trans-Blot® Turbo™ Transfer System (1704150, BioRad)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l15i","text":"+ standard lab equipment such as a shaker, bench top centrifuge and heat block","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7g5qt","text":"Culture cells as usual in a 12-well or 6-well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e5rk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5i1g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"etd6","text":"We recommend including a control using an LRRK2 kinase inhibitor (eg MLi-2, 100 nM for 1 hr) in your sample preparation to verify phospho-Rab immunoblots.  ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ar4m","text":"Wash cells once in PBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9oa5","text":"Prepare protein lysates by adding sample loading buffer and reducing agent (eg NuPAGE LDS sample buffer and reducing agent).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eg446","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2q800","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":59},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":84}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"75t63","text":" The final protein concentration should be in the range of  . We recommend loading   of total protein per lane. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2spv0","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"concentration":"1-2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"41669730FD3111ECA6BD87F238F47893","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":205},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"concentration"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"10-15","error":false,"guid":"590223A0FD3111ECA6BD87F238F47893","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkp23","text":"Transfer SDS gel into 20% EtOH while preparing the transfer stack. Make sure the gel is submerged. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6a4fm","text":"Transfer PVDF membrane into 5 % milk/TBS-T and block for   at RT with constant shaking. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dk6j2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8llh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9qg3f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"455D1B30FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fhrrs","text":"We routinely cut the membrane into three parts to be able to blot for LRRK2, a loading control and Rabs at the same time. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9joqu","text":"Add 100 μl per 12-well or  200 μl per 6 well of lysis buffer containing protease and phosphatase inhibitors. Keep samples   from now on.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":122,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fmv32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E1EFA800FD3011ECA6BD87F238F47893","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cokrc","text":"Scrape cells using a cell lifter and transfer lysate to a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkoap","text":"Vortex and incubate on ice for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aa0c4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"14F94220FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rg4e","text":"Clarify lysate by spinning at   at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":31,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aluf4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"17000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"28E9EF00FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"25937100FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"21E0C940FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3djar","text":"Transfer supernatant into a fresh 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube and store at -20 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75fv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3rinp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eesg6","text":"Determine protein concentration using an assay of choice (eg Pierce™ Coomassie Plus Assay Kit)","type":"ordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12qql","text":"Denature samples at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"16efo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0A6EE4E0FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":480,"guid":"3376E450FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bdbq","text":"Prepare the SDS gel (4-12% Bis-Tris Nu-PAGE gel) by assembling the apparatus, filling the tank with MES running buffer and flushing all the wells with MES running buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rd2s","text":"Spin down the samples quickly in case of condensation and load wells carefully. Include a broad range molecular weight marker (eg Broad molecular weight ladder, ab116028, Abcam). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"n1am","text":"Run the gel at 180 V for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3s80b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2100,"guid":"3CB40110FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c81j5","text":"Transfer proteins using BioRad pre-programmed protocols: Mixed MW setting (2.5A for  ). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5lk0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":420,"guid":"426D9C60FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3bgv","text":"Prepare the transfer stack according to the manufacturer's instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

no (Supplier)","Dilution"],["pan-phospho-Rab","ab230260 (Abcam)","1:1000"],["Rab8A","6975S (Cell Signaling)","1:1000"],["Rab10 pT73","ab230261 (Abcam)","1:1000"],["Rab10","8127S (Cell (Sigma-Aldrich)","1:5000"]],"guid":"83BFF3C0FD0D11ECACBA636B5A27F641","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":8,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"d4ctm","text":"Table ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Target","Catalogue no (Supplier)","Dilution"],["pan-phospho-Rab","ab230260 (Abcam)","1:1000"],["Rab8A","6975S (Cell Signaling)","1:1000"],["Rab10 pT73","ab230261 (Abcam)","1:1000"],["Rab10","8127S (Cell Signaling)","1:1000"],["LRRK2 pS935","ab133450 (Abcam)","1:1000"],["LRRK2 ","ab133474 (Abcam)","1:1000"],["beta-Actin","A1978-200UL (Sigma-Aldrich)","1:5000"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gue8","text":"Wash membranes by shaking in TBS-T for 5-10 min ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n66v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"64q0b","text":"Repeat the wash step 2x ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8c5ce","text":"Repeat washing steps as above. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dm0g0","text":"Detect signal using appropriate detection equipment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tnh7","text":"Depending on the primary antibodies and the detection method used, it might be necessary to strip the blot using a Western Blot Stripping buffer (eg #T7135A, Takara Bio) for   at RT and repeat the primary and secondary antibody incubation steps.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":174,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"52024220FD3011EC880B39CA6A4B04FB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
